action.description: The recommendation of the committee(s) on GVO is to ADVISE AND CONSENT to the nomination(s).  The votes in GVO were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) McKelvey, Moriwaki, San Buenaventura; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Gabbard, Fevella.
